A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson Missed out on a huge opportunity to take the Star Wars saga to Great places . Instead he decided to get cute with the whole let the past die bullshit . He disrespected the fans and the history of Star Wars itself . The way he treated Lukes passing \, The Leia floating thru space scene \, Rey's Lineage & Snoke was just awful . Thank You for killing my childhood & taking away my dreams for a spectacular film that could have been . Makes me miss George Lucas and his vision
